https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zF5NU1zzSdsCyRzpYN3i8a3zraZ.jpg It's 1993 and North Carolina is experiencing a historic drought. Autistic teen Carl, fascinated by weather, predicts that a storm will soon hit nearby. His sister Sam crafts a plan to help him chase the storm, stealing their mother's ice-cream truck to embark on a road trip about family, forgiveness, and following your dreams. Drought
